400.description: The request has been rejected by the server. It may contain content that the server does not allow, or missing mandatory parameters.

404.description: The resource you are trying to load has not been found.

500.description: The server failed a task and has not given more exact details.

generic.description: A request failed without providing further details. This can also happen when there is no internet connection on the device.

validation.email: The value is not a valid email.
